insert into Province_data (country_Type, continents, province_Name, province_Short_Name, comment, location_Id, crawl_Time, country, create_Time, modify_Time) values (#{countryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{continents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crawlTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update Province_data set country_Type = #{countryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, continents = #{continents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_Name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_Short_Name = #{provinceShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_Id = #{locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, crawl_Time = #{crawlTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_Time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_Time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, country_Type, continents, province_Name, province_Short_Name, comment, location_Id, crawl_Time, country, create_Time, modify_Time from Province_data where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
